title: Tracking
description: [Global Positioning Systems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Global_Positioning_System) (GPS) use satellites to [trilaterate](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trilateration) a device's position on Planet Earth. You will need to use a _very_ similar method to solve this problem. Download the description and input file to get started!
hint: Submit your flag in the format: `sctf{x, y, z}`
author: Zachary Taylor
